content:
The main in-person event is the Dataverse Community Meeting, and the 10th annual is coming up. It's linked from https://dataverse.org/events

However, other events take place as well, both in-person and virtual.

In the last year a good number of working groups have started meeting regularly. They are newly listed at https://www.gdcc.io/working-groups.html and mostly listed in the Dataverse Community Calendar.

I recently revived my idea of listing meetups as well. In the 2023-12 Dataverse Community News, I wrote, "If you are attending a Dataverse-related conference, you are encouraged to start a thread about it on the mailing list and add it to a shared spreadsheet: https://groups.google.com/g/dataverse-community/c/huhI8TyE8a0/m/4ey2-TIlAAAJ "
